Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Swift Swim 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
10 Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
25 Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
40 Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
55 Hydration 5 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
70 Speed Boost 9 Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
85 Multiscale 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
100 Pure Power 15 Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Sp. Attack stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 32 Storm Drain 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Water-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 39 Swift Swim 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
Disc 49 Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 50 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Bland Skin -4 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Dancer 6 When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it immediately does so regardless of its Speed.
Distillize 8 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Flood Surge 9 Turns the ground into Flooded Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Healer 2 Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.
Hydration 5 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Misty Surge 9 Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Multiscale 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Natural Cure 7 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Pixilate 8 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Pure Power 15 Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Sp. Attack stat.
Rain Dish 3 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Speed Boost 9 Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
Sweet Veil 5 Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.
Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Unaware 7 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
Water Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
Water Bubble 8 Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents it from getting a burn.
Water Compaction 5 Blocks Water-type moves to sharply boost the Pokémon's Defense.
Wonder Skin 5 Makes status moves more likely to miss.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
